author: Staff Reporter
text:
Andal, the 60-year-old elephant at Kurumbapatti Zoological Park too was given nutrient food as it could not attend the rejuvenation camp at Thekkampatti.

Andal was garlanded by officials, and a special puja was performed on Thursday. Officials said that because of ailment, Andal was not taken to the camp in the last two years. The elephant would be given the same diet as prescribed for elephants at the camp.
title: Andal stays at Kurumbapatti Zoo
